name: GetGiftList
description: Retrieves information about a Gift List by its ID.

Content-Type.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

$block: Object with information about the Gift List.

$ul: **IsPublic**: Defines if the gift list is public.
**dateCreated**: Date when the gift list was created.
**eventCity**: City of the event associated with the Gift List.
**eventDate**: Date of the event associated with the Gift List.
**eventLocation**: Location of the event associated with the Gift List.
**eventState**: State of the event associated with the Gift List.
**giftCardRechargeSkuId**: ID of the SKU that recharges the gift card.
**giftListMembers**: Array of members of the gift list.
**giftListSkuIds**: Array with the IDs of SKUs that are part of the gift list.
**isActive**: Defines if the gift list is active.
**isAddressOk**: Validates the address of the gift list.
**memberNames**: Name of the members of the gift list.
**shipsToOwner**: Defines if items purchased from the gift list will be shipped to the owner of the gift list.
**urlFolder**: Slug of the gift list that will be part of its URL.
